name: M.I.A (itch) (Rain)
description:
Objective: [Redacted]

Controls: 

Movement = W A S D

Weapons = 1, 2, 3

Fire =  Mouse Button  0

Knife Charged Attack = Hold Mouse Button 0

Aim Down Sight = Mouse Button 3

Reload = R

Check Magazine = Hold R

Dodge = Space + Movement

Pause = Escape

WARNING: There's a Epilepsy visual effect that potentially trigger seizures for people with Photosensitive Epilepsy
